review_comments: example/src/index.ts:1 – The example now boots Revurb via `createServer`, logs the running WebSocket endpoint, and hooks SIGINT/SIGTERM to `shutdown`, matching the new spec requirement. No issues surfaced here.
README.md:181 – Example instructions were updated to explain the single-process workflow so devs only need `cd example && bun run dev`; the text aligns with the new bootstrap code and looks accurate.

No regressions detected in the commits since 99c28f3. Residual risk: I couldn’t fully smoke-test `bun run dev` inside `example/` because port 3000 is already occupied on this machine, so the frontend server portion wasn’t verified end-to-end.
additional_comments: Logged the review in specs/review.md and pushed commit b93029b. If you want extra assurance, free up port 3000 and run `cd example && bun run dev` to see both servers come up together.
